version_description:
SIRI INTEGRATION
Use Siri to send a private message or search for images in Behance projects

APPLE WATCH UPDATES
Behance for Apple Watch has been redesigned for watchOS 3, with better performance and new watch complications

RICH PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Push Notifications will now include images of project covers and user avatars on iOS 10 devices

STATS WIDGET
Keep track of how your work is being seen and appreciated by adding the new stats widget to your search screen

SPOTLIGHT CONTINUATION
On iOS 10, it's easier to find work by continuing your spotlight searches inside the Behance app

HAPTIC FEEDBACK
The app will now deliver subtle vibrations in response to your actions when used with iPhone 7 and 7 Plus

---

Recently released:

SIRI INTEGRATION
Use Siri to send a private message or search for images in Behance projects

APPLE WATCH UPDATES
Behance for Apple Watch has been redesigned for watchOS 3, with better performance and new watch complications

RICH PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Push Notifications will now include images of project covers and user avatars on iOS 10 devices

STATS WIDGET
Keep track of how your work is being seen and appreciated by adding the new stats widget to your search screen

SPOTLIGHT CONTINUATION
On iOS 10, it's easier to find work by continuing your spotlight searches inside the Behance app

DISCOVER FEED
Artwork is now front and center in the discover feed, making browsing new work faster and more beautiful than ever

VIDEO PUBLISHING
In addition to embedding video from external sites, you can now upload videos directly from your device when composing your projects

CREATIVE CLOUD ASSETS
When creating projects, you can now include images from Lightroom and Creative Cloud files saved from Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.

SAVE PROJECTS AS DRAFTS
Need some extra time to work on a project? Now you can save projects as drafts and come back to them later

DISCOVER FEED
Artwork is now front and center in the discover feed, making browsing new work faster and more beautiful than ever

VIDEO PUBLISHING
In addition to embedding video from external sites, you can now upload videos directly from your device when composing your projects

CREATIVE CLOUD ASSETS
When creating projects, you can now include images from Lightroom and Creative Cloud files saved from Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.

SAVE PROJECTS AS DRAFTS
Need some extra time to work on a project? Now you can save projects as drafts and come back to them later

DISCOVER FEED
An improved browsing experience for the iPad makes it easy to find and view great work from the community

NEW PROJECT SETTINGS
When publishing work, you can now specify fields like tools used and project co-owners

COMMENT MENTIONS
Compose comments with @-mentions, and receive push notifications when mentioned by others

DISCOVER FEED
An improved browsing experience for the iPad makes it easy to find and view great work from the community

NEW PROJECT SETTINGS
When publishing work, you can now specify fields like tools used and project co-owners

COMMENT MENTIONS
Compose comments with @-mentions, and receive push notifications when mentioned by others

DISCOVER FEED
An improved browsing experience for the iPad makes it easy to find and view great work from the community

NEW PROJECT SETTINGS
When publishing work, you can now specify fields like tools used and project co-owners

COMMENT MENTIONS
Compose comments with @-mentions, and receive push notifications when mentioned by others


Have feedback for us? We’d love to hear it: behance-mobile@adobe.com

This release includes bug fixes and improvements, including:
- New: Search collections by creative field and location
- New: Make your collections public or private
- Fixed: notifications could become stuck when upgrading from older versions
- Fixed: issues editing existing projects that contain embedded audio


Have feedback for us? We’d love to hear it: behance-mobile@adobe.com

This release includes bug fixes and improvements, including:
- New: Added the ability to clone existing projects
- New: You can now make embedded content span the full-width of your projects
- Fixed: Ability to rotate images from projects when zoomed in


Have feedback for us? We’d love to hear it: behance-mobile@adobe.com

This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Have feedback for us? We’d love to hear it: behance-mobile@adobe.com

CREATE PROJECTS WITH DRAG & DROP
When creating projects, drag and drop of text and images is supported on iOS 11

CREATE PROJECTS WITH DRAG & DROP
When creating projects, drag and drop of text and images is supported on iOS 11
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements, including support for iPhone X

ADOBE LIVE
Get a behind-the-scenes look at top creatives live streaming their techniques

SEE HOW CREATIVES CREATE
Share in the moment with Work in Progress, a new format that expires after 24 hours

RENEWED INSPIRATION
It's easier than ever to discover work, with a feed of large, high-quality images from our community

BROWSING ACCELERATED
Projects have gone full screen, and now, all it takes is a swipe to move between them

PROJECT PUBLISHING
Creating a project is simpler than ever, and can now be done in one-step on iPad

WORK IN PROGRESS RECOMMENDED
This release includes a personalized Work in Progress category, which recommends work based on your past activity

PROJECT VIEWING
Enjoy quick access to share projects, add them to collections, and find other work by the same creators

PERSONALIZED PROFILES
Behance profiles have a sleeker design and show the unique banner images users have added.

SEARCH AND EXPLORE
It’s faster than ever to find creativity, with additions for autocomplete, search history, and search suggestions.

LIVESTREAMING
Join a livestream and learn tips and techniques from users in the Behance community.
